page.title: 19Junior Recreation.
page.content: Most children enjoy playing ball games.They all love to run about and talk with their friends.Many children enact television programmes they have watched,instead of making up their own games.They seem to have lost their imagination. A very popular pastime with youngsters is playing computer games.Computers are linked up to television screens and the games are fed into them through cassette players or disk drives. 1985 was the 75th anniversary of guiding.In this area there are active packs of Brownies,Guides,Rangers and Cubs.Many girls and boys enjoy belonging to these. Older boys in this area belong to the Air Training Corps or the Army Cadets.
